description.displayText:
Mary is a very experienced caregiver and incredibly dedicated--she is always on time to work, and always willing to stay late if needed. Mary has been indispensable in helping us create a loving and nurturing home for our daughter while also enabling us to thrive in our (often very demanding) jobs.

To find Mary, we went through 200 applications, interviewed 20, and trialed 5. Mary's warm, joyful, and loving nature made her stand out, and continued after we hired her. When our daughter was a baby, Mary would talk with her and interact with her all day, and get down on the floor with her and play. She made her fresh pureed baby foods. As our daughter has grown older Mary makes delicious, healthy meals (for our daughter and for all of us--she is an accomplished cook), spends much of the day outdoors with our daughter, takes her to classes/play dates, etc., does our laundry, and helps us keep our home / lives running smoothly.

description.displayText: Mary is kind, patient, compassionate, caring and trustworthy. Wonderful child care giver. HIGHLY recommend her.
description.originalText: Mary is kind, patient, compassionate, caring and trustworthy. Wonderful child care giver. HIGHLY recommend her.

description.displayText: Mary is the most loving, trustworthy and responsible child care provider I know. She lived with my family for 6 years and helped us raise 4 kids. She has a bubbly personality, a super positive outlook and a genuine kindness. She loves children and it is evident. Any family would be extremely lucky to have her.

She has a bubbly personality, a super positive outlook and a genuine kindness. She loves children and it is evident. Any family would be extremely lucky to have her.

description.displayText: She has been of great help to my children and family. She is the most caring person I have ever known and will recommend her to any parent looking for a babysitter or nanny. Thank you.
